headline: Boston Beer (SAM) Tops Q1 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Boston Beer (SAM) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 176.92% and 11.36%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
